title: 2019-02-16 志賀町の山中ポータルの位置ずらし
html:
2019-02-16 志賀町の山中ポータルの位置ずらし

このポスト

その後の位置修正申請 (2018-11-02) も Recon によって蹴られた (2019-02-16) 。 ゲームで三角作る優位を確保するためだけに申請し続けてる人もいるんだな、と。そういう連中はゲームのメタな情報をいじれるなら、やるわなぁ。

このポストの当時は思い浮かばなかったが、ポケモンgo のゆるふわプレイヤが何らかの有利になる理由で申請した可能性も？と思ったけど、山中で麓からじゃ届かない位置にずらしてるからねぇ。RES は地元だと私ぐらいしか行ったことないし、おそらくは石川、あるいは能登の ENL の連中なのよね…

2019-02-16

↓とりあえず、英語で返信してみる。

The current location is obviously wrong. This location has been changed by malicious Portal Edit submission.

The correct/previous location is here.

https://www.google.co.jp/maps/?q=37.012300,136.785222

It seems the OPR Edit interface cannot detect duplicated Portal. That is problem.

↓やはり自動返信が返ってくるのみ… どうしたもんかねぇ。

Thanks for contacting Niantic Support. We’re sending you this automated reply to let you know we've received your message. One of our helpful team
members will get back to you shortly.
### Do not reply below this line ###

そういえば、ぐぐたすの community も失くなるはずだし、Apeal サイトはどうするんだろ？

次は Help Center へ、かな？

2019-02-18

追加の返信が。やっぱ Portal Apeal に誘導されるのね。これも人ではなく自動返信なんじゃね？ナメてるなw

Hello Agent, Thanks for contacting us. If you're trying to appeal a Portal edit; please submit your request through the Official Google+ community for Ingress Portal Appeals. Please include the Portal title, address, lat/long, reason for the appeal, and all relevant pictures/screenshots that will help us review your appeal for the fastest possible response, as mentioned in this [pinned post] on the community. Please know that we are taking this extra verification step in response to a few situations in the past where we later were asked to restore Portals after being removed. We understand that this is a time-sensitive issue and we will promptly review your request once we have received this confirmation. Regards,
### Do not reply below this line ###

とりあえず Apeal サイトへ投下。malicious 表現は止めとけばよかったかな？

https://plus.google.com/106507564317880442914/posts/7SUQpHHsG7i

Portal Apeal のコミュニティ読んでると、ほぼ反応してないみたいねw これ、自動返信だわ。 わざと時間を空けて、人手を介しているように見せかけてるわけね。

2019-02-19

You recently contacted our customer support. How happy were you with our service? # Do not reply to this email
You recently contacted our customer support about “Portal edit review complete: 末吉城址(東屋)”

リアクションまったくしてないのに、これもおかしいだろww

https://plus.google.com/u/1/106507564317880442914/posts/7SUQpHHsG7i

I've posted the Portal Apeal but no reaction here. I'm no happy.

2019-02-28 (1)

ダメ元でメールに煽り返信してみると…

I have posted:

https://plus.google.com/106507564317880442914/posts/7SUQpHHsG7i

But no sense to action.

We understand that this is a time-sensitive issue and we will promptly review your request once we have received this confirmation.

Great!

2019-02-28 (2)

Hello Agent, Thank you for contacting Ingress Support. We've made adjustments to the Portal in question. The changes should reflect on your Scanner and Intel Map. I really appreciate you for helping us to maintain the accuracy of Portals. If you have any other queries that we could assist you with, feel free to reach out to us and we will be happy to assist you with the same. Have a great day ahead!

直ったww

Intel
